annotations: 12.08.2024 Dear All; 1- “MV Al Luqta” – 10,500 dwt on 7.35m – built 2004  (under/on deck full / part cargoes dir Med or China range)* East Coast of India 15-25 Aug 2024  Details: * MV Al Luqta- DWT 10,500 mts on 7.35 m draft- Built 10/2004 at Damen Shipyards, the Netherlands Flag : Panama Class BV- Gt/Nt                 : 7,767/ 3,856- Suez                   : 8,027.85/ 7,154.51- PANAMA           : 6,914- LOA 145.63 / LBP 138.82 / Beam 18.25 / Depth 10.30 m- 2 Ho/2 Ha- HOLDS’ DIMENSIONS; No.1                     : 38.95x13.15 x11.05 / 5409 cbm=191019 cu.ftNo.2                     : 65.41x13.15x11.05 / 9468 cbm=334373 cu.ft- HATCH COAMING 2.20M- Pontoon Hatch Covers (Lift Away by ship's gantry) - Hatch No1        : 38.95 x 13.15m / Hatch No2: 65.41 x 13.15m- #1 cubic             : Abt 5,409.071 cbm Grain (191,019.546 cbft) - #2 cubic             : Abt 9,469.382 cbm Grain (334,408.078 cbft) - TOTAL Cubic    : Abt 14,878.453 cbm Grain (525,427.624 cbft)- Bulkheads         : 4 Movable Bulkheads, 17 Store positions  - Container capacities;* on deck            : 363 teu or 163 feu+25 teu * In holds            : 302 teu or 150 feu+02 teu* total                  : 665 teu or 313 feu + 27 teu* 60 reefer plugs - T.T. Strengths;* 18t/sqm tanktop, * 3.50t/sqm tweens, * 1.75t/sqm h.covers * 1.75t/sqm weather deck - CRANES             : 2 X 80 ts (combinable 160ts) Liebherr SWL Electrical Hydraulic Located on Starboard side.Outreach of Max 34m at 32mt SWL - Fuel Tanks        : vlsfo abt 360 mt / lsmgo abt 100 mt (bss 85%)- M/E                    : 1 x MaK 9M32C 4,320 kw / 600 rpm- Aux Engine       : 3 Caterpillar of each 350 kw/1500 rpm- 1 shaft generator 690 kw/1500 rpm- Emerg. Engine 1 Sisu diesel dsrg 620 96 kw/1500 rpm- Bowthruster     : 650 kw fitted- “all details about / in good faith”++++   Krgds //Mehmet ALKACAR / Cpt.
